name: Path of the Zealot
description: Zealots are barbarians driven by divine fury. Their rage is sanctified by higher powers, allowing them to deal holy damage and defy death itself.

3.name: Divine Fury
3.description: While raging, the first creature you hit on each of your turns takes extra radiant or necrotic damage.

6.name: Fanatical Focus
6.description: If you fail a saving throw while raging, you can reroll it and must use the new roll.

10.name: Zealous Presence
10.description: As a bonus action, you unleash divine power that grants advantage on attack rolls and saving throws to allies within range for 1 round.

14.name: Rage Beyond Death
14.description: While raging, having 0 hit points doesnâ€™t knock you unconscious. You still make death saving throws, and you only die if your rage ends while you still have 0 hit points.
